aup.Proposer.BOHBProposer¶

BOBH proposer inherited from HpBandSter to showcase the simplicity of Auptimizer to integrate new HPO algorithms. The get_params() method is based on the master.py from the original BOHB implementation.

Configuration¶

General parameters¶

Detailed explanations availale on the HpBandSter API documentation page.

Name

Default value

Explanation

n_iterations

4

General iterations

min_points_in_model

None

Number of points to construct KDE

top_n_percent

15

Percentage to keep

num_samples

64

Number of samples for EI

random_fraction

0.3333333333333333

Fraction to explore randomly

bandwidth_factor

3

Widening factor for KDE

min_bandwidth

0.001

Minimum sample bandwidth

APIs¶

class BOHBProposer(config)[source]¶

Bases: aup.Proposer.AbstractProposer.AbstractProposer

active_iterations()[source]¶

Based on hpbandster.core.master.Master.active_iterations().

static create_configspace(parameter_config)[source]¶

Wrap the Worker’s get_configspace() function for HpBandSter interface

failed(job)[source]¶

Failed jobs unsupported by BOHB Proposer.

Parameters

job (Job) – Failed job, containing job id

get_next_iteration(iteration, iteration_kwargs={})[source]¶

Copied from https://github.com/automl/HpBandSter/blob/master/hpbandster/optimizers/bohb.py

get_param()[source]¶

Get the next hyperparameter values, return None when experiment is finished. :return: hyperparameters in dictionary

reload(path)[source]¶

Reload Proposer state from path

Parameters

path (str) – path to reload

save(path)[source]¶

Save Proposer state to path.

Some proposer can not generate new parameters after saving.

Parameters

path (str) – path to save

static setup_config()[source]¶
update(score, job)[source]¶

Wrap result and transfer to HpBandSter :param score: result :param job: job contains job id for configuration matching
